sn46.56:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn46.56:4.3: Atha kho abhayo rājakumāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn46.56:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho abhayo rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn46.56:4.8: Ahetu, appaccayo aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ hoti.
sn46.56:4.9: Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya.
sn46.56:4.12: “Atthi, rājakumāra, hetu, atthi paccayo aññāṇāya adassanāya.
sn46.56:4.13: Sahetu, sappaccayo aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ hoti.
sn46.56:4.14: Atthi, rājakumāra, hetu, atthi paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya.
sn46.56:5.1: “Katamo pana, bhante, hetu, katamo paccayo aññāṇāya adassanāya?
sn46.56:5.2: Kathaṃ sahetu, sappaccayo aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ hotī”ti?
sn46.56:5.3: “Yasmiṃ kho, rājakumāra, samaye kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati kāmarāgaparetena, uppannassa ca kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti na passati—
sn46.56:5.4: ayampi kho, rājakumāra, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo aññāṇāya adassanāya.
sn46.56:5.5: Evampi sahetu sappaccayo aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ hoti.
sn46.56:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, rājakumāra, yasmiṃ samaye byāpādapariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati byāpādaparetena … pe …
sn46.56:6.4: vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhitena cetasā viharati vicikicchāparetena, uppannāya ca vicikicchāya nissaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti na passati—
sn46.56:6.5: ayampi kho, rājakumāra, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo aññāṇāya adassanāya.
sn46.56:6.6: Evampi sahetu sappaccayo aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ hotī”ti.
sn46.56:7.5: Ekamekenapi kho, bhante, nīvaraṇena abhibhūto yathābhūtaṃ na jāneyya na passeyya, ko pana vādo pañcahi nīvaraṇehi?
sn46.56:8.1: Katamo pana, bhante, hetu, katamo paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya?
sn46.56:8.2: Kathaṃ sahetu, sappaccayo ñāṇaṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti?
sn46.56:8.3: “Idha, rājakumāra, bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
sn46.56:8.4: So satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvitena cittena yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati—
sn46.56:8.5: ayampi kho, rājakumāra, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya.
sn46.56:8.6: Evampi sahetu, sappaccayo ñāṇaṃ dassanaṃ hoti.
sn46.56:9.2: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
sn46.56:9.3: So upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvitena cittena yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passati—
sn46.56:9.4: ayampi kho, rājakumāra, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo ñāṇāya dassanāya.
sn46.56:9.5: Evaṃ sahetu, sappaccayo ñāṇaṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti.
sn46.56:10.5: Ekamekenapi kho, bhante, bojjhaṅgena samannāgato yathābhūtaṃ jāneyya passeyya, ko pana vādo sattahi bojjhaṅgehi?
sn46.56:10.6: Yopi me, bhante, gijjhakūṭaṃ pabbataṃ ārohantassa kāyakilamatho cittakilamatho, sopi me paṭippassaddho, dhammo ca me abhisamito”ti.
